'''Peculiar Collab Coupon''' is an event currency for the [[Invitation of Windblume]] event. They can be earned as a reward from the [[Invitation of Windblume/Peculiar Wonderland|Peculiar Wonderland domain]] and can be spent in the [[Invitation of Windblume#Peculiar Collab Coupon|Event Shop]] for valuable rewards.
